values.title: Mahatma Gandhi
values.desc: When I despair I remember that all through history the way of truth and love have always won. There have been tyrants and murderers and for a time they can seem invincible but in the end they always fall Think of italways

values.title: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
values.desc: Every man has his secret, sorrows which the world knows not and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad

values.title: Jonathan Safran Foer
values.desc: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness

values.title: John Green
values.desc: What you must understand about me is that Im a deeply unhappy person

values.title: Clive Barker
values.desc: Any fool can be happy It takes a man with real heart to make beauty out of the stuff that makes us weep

values.title: Markus Zusak
values.desc: Imagine smiling after a slap in the face, Then think of doing it twentyfour hours a day

values.title: Jos N Harris
values.desc: Tears shed for another person are not a sign of weakness. They are a sign of a pure heart

values.title: Nikolai V Gogol
values.desc: The longer and more carefully we look at a funny story, the sadder it becomes

values.title: Paulo Coelho
values.desc: Tears are words that need to be written

values.title: Lauren Conrad
values.desc: Don't cry over someone who wouldnt cry over you

values.title: Nicole Krauss
values.desc: there are two types of people in the world - those who prefer to be sad among others and those who prefer to be sad alone

values.title: Ned Vizzini
values.desc: I can't eat and I can't sleep. I'm not doing well in terms of being a functional human you know

values.title: EA Bucchianeri
values.desc: So it's true when all is said and done grief is the price we pay for love

values.title: Oscar Wilde
values.desc: Nothing can cure the soul but the senses just as nothing can cure the senses but the soul
